name: GRVT global promoters
desc: Global Promoters are GRVT's VIP ambassadors, sharing all about GRVT to their communities to expand our global reach.
requirement: At least 30K followers on any social channel (Limited monthly spot available)
rewards: Bonus raffles tickets for zkSync Mystery Box

name: GRVT creators
desc: GRVT Creators partner with our marketing team to produce diverse, multilingual content, such as blogs, videos, and social media posts, centered around GRVT products and trading.
requirement: Share a sample content that you created about GRVT
rewards: Bonus raffles tickets for zkSync Mystery Box

name: GRVT business developers
desc: If you have valuable connections with Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs), Influencers, or Power Traders, you can refer them to GRVT and earn benefits.
requirement: Anyone with existing relationships with KOLs or Power Traders
Share about your largest and closest KOLs and Power Traders
rewards: Bonus raffles tickets for zkSync Mystery Box

name: GRVT community ambassadors
desc: Join as a GRVT Community Ambassador to lead our Discord and social media platforms, engaging the community and amplifying GRVT's reach in collaboration with our marketing team.
requirement: Submit ideas about discord or social media strategies
And share what you know about GRVT
rewards: Bonus raffles tickets for zkSync Mystery Box
